valid:
run Neg1 {
  some disj U1, U2: User | some disj PAd, PN: Photo | some disj D1, D2: Day {
    User = U1 + U2
    Influencer = none
    Photo = PAd + PN
    Ad = PAd
    Day = D1 + D2

    follows = none->none
    sees = U1->PAd
    posts = U1->PAd + U2->PN
    suggested = none->none
    date = PAd->D1 + PN->D2
  }
} for 2 User, 2 Photo, 2 Day expect 0

parse:
run Pos1 {
    some disj U1, U2: User | some disj Pn: Photo | some disj D1: Day {
        User = U1 + U2
        Influencer = none
        Photo = Pn
        Ad = none
        Day = D1

        follows = U2->U1
        posts = U1->Pn
        sees = U2->Pn
        suggested = none
        date = Pn->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run Pos2 {
    some disj I, U: User | some disj P1: Photo | some disj D1: Day {
        User = I + U
        Influencer = I
        Photo = P1
        Ad = none
        Day = D1

        follows = U->I
        posts = I->P1
        sees = U->P1
        suggested = none
        date = P1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj U1, U2: User | some disj A1: Photo | some disj D1: Day {
        User = U1 + U2
        Influencer = none
        Photo = A1
        Ad = A1
        Day = D1

        follows = none->none
        posts = U2->A1
        sees = U1->A1 + U2->A1
        suggested = none
        date = A1->D1
    }
} for 2 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj U1, U2, U3: User | some disj A1: Photo | some disj D1: Day {
        User = U1 + U2 + U3
        Influencer = none
        Photo = A1
        Ad = A1
        Day = D1

        follows = U1->U2
        posts = U3->A1
        sees = U1->A1 + U2->A1 + U3->A1
        suggested = none
        date = A1->D1
    }
} for 3 User, 1 Photo, 1 Day expect 0

run Pos2 {
    some disj Wb, We : Workstation | some disj H1, H2 : Worker | some disj C, M : Product {
        Workstation = Wb + We
        begin = Wb
        end = We

        Worker = H1 + H2
        Human = H1 + H2
        Robot = none

        Product = C + M
        Component = C
        Material = M
        Dangerous = none

        workers = Wb->H1 + We->H2
        succ = none

        parts = C->M
        workstation = C->We
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 2 Worker, 2 Product expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj Wb, We : Workstation | some disj H1, R1, H2 : Worker | some disj C : Product {
        Workstation = Wb + We
        begin = Wb
        end = We

        Worker = H1 + R1 + H2
        Human = H1 + H2
        Robot = R1

        Product = C
        Component = C
        Material = none
        Dangerous = none

        workers = Wb->H1 + Wb->R1 + We->H2
        succ = none

        parts = C->C
        workstation = C->We
    }
} for 2 Workstation, 3 Worker, 1 Product expect 0

run Pos1 {
    some disj P1: Person | some disj C1: Course | some disj G1, G2: Grade {
        Person = P1
        Professor = P1
        Student = P1
        Course = C1
        Project = none
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P1->C1
        enrolled = P1->C1

        Person <: projects = none->none
        Course <: projects = none->none
        grades = none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 1 Person, 1 Course, 0 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj P1: Person | some disj C1: Course | some disj G1, G2: Grade {
        Person = P1
        Professor = none
        Student = P1
        Course = C1
        Project = none
        Grade = G1 + G2

        teaches = P1->C1 // P1 teaches but is not a professor
        enrolled = P1->C1 // enrolled person is a student

        Person <: projects = none->none
        Course <: projects = none->none
        grades = none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 1 Person, 1 Course, 0 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Pos1 {
    some disj Prof, Stud : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj Pr1 : Project | some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof + Stud
        Professor = Prof
        Student = Stud
        Course = C1
        Project = Pr1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C1
        Person <: enrolled = Stud->C1
        Person <: projects = none

        Course <: projects = C1->Pr1
        Course <: grades = C1->Stud->G1

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Pos2 {
    some disj Prof : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj Pr1, Pr2 : Project | some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof
        Professor = Prof
        Student = none
        Course = C1
        Project = Pr1 + Pr2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C1
        Person <: enrolled = none
        Person <: projects = none

        Course <: projects = C1->Pr1 + C1->Pr2
        Course <: grades = none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 1 Person, 1 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj Prof : Person | some disj C1, C2 : Course | some disj Pr1 : Project | some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof
        Professor = Prof
        Student = none
        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = Pr1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C1 + Prof->C2
        Person <: enrolled = none
        Person <: projects = none

        Course <: projects = C1->Pr1 + C2->Pr1
        Course <: grades = none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 1 Person, 2 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj Prof : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj Pr1 : Project | some disj G1, G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof
        Professor = Prof
        Student = none
        Course = C1
        Project = Pr1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C1
        Person <: enrolled = none
        Person <: projects = none

        Course <: projects = none
        Course <: grades = none

        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 1 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

valid:
run Neg1 {
    some disj P1,P2,P3 : Person | some disj C1 : Course | some disj PR1 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3
        Professor = P1 + P2
        Student = P3
        Course = C1
        Project = PR1
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = P1->C1 + P2->C1                 // Violation: colleagues co-teach the same course
        Person <: enrolled = P3->C1                          // Only students are enrolled
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1                         // Project proposed by exactly one course
        Person <: projects = P3->PR1                         // Only students work on projects; each project has someone
        Course <: grades = C1->P3->G1                        // Arbitrary grading
        Grade <: next = G1->G2                               // Total order over Grade

        // Student works on at most one project per course (one project per course here).
    }
} for 3 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj P1,P2,P3,P4 : Person | some disj C1,C2 : Course | some disj PR1,PR2 : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = P1 + P2 + P3 + P4
        Professor = P1 + P2
        Student = P3 + P4
        Course = C1 + C2
        Project = PR1 + PR2
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = P1->C1 + P2->C1 + P2->C2         // Violation: colleagues co-teach C1; C2 has a single teacher
        Person <: enrolled = P3->C1 + P4->C2                  // Only students are enrolled
        Course <: projects = C1->PR1 + C2->PR2                // Each project proposed by exactly one course
        Person <: projects = P3->PR1 + P4->PR2                // Only students work on projects; each project has someone
        Course <: grades = C1->P3->G1 + C2->P4->G2            // Arbitrary grading
        Grade <: next = G1->G2                                // Total order over Grade

        // Each student works on at most one project per course (one project per course here).
    }
} for 4 Person, 2 Course, 2 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

parse:
run Pos1 {
    some disj Prof,Stud : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj P : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof + Stud
        Professor = Prof
        Student = Stud
        Course = C
        Project = P
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C                           // Only professors teach; course has a teacher
        Person <: enrolled = Stud->C                          // Only students are enrolled
        Person <: projects = Stud->P                          // Only students work on projects; project has someone
        Course <: projects = C->P                             // Each project proposed by exactly one course
        Course <: grades = Stud->G1                           // Only the student has a grade (requirement holds)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2                                // Total order over Grade
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Pos2 {
    some disj Prof,Stud : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj P : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof + Stud
        Professor = Prof
        Student = Stud
        Course = C
        Project = P
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C
        Person <: enrolled = Stud->C
        Person <: projects = Stud->P
        Course <: projects = C->P
        Course <: grades = Stud->G1 + Stud->G2               // Only the student has grades (requirement holds)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 1

run Neg1 {
    some disj Prof,Stud : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj P : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof + Stud
        Professor = Prof
        Student = Stud
        Course = C
        Project = P
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C
        Person <: enrolled = Stud->C                          // Professor not enrolled (cannot teach herself/colleagues)
        Person <: projects = Stud->P
        Course <: projects = C->P
        Course <: grades = Stud->G1 + Prof->G2               // Professor has a grade (requirement violated)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0

run Neg2 {
    some disj Prof,Stud : Person | some disj C : Course | some disj P : Project | some disj G1,G2 : Grade {
        Person = Prof + Stud
        Professor = Prof
        Student = Stud
        Course = C
        Project = P
        Grade = G1 + G2

        Person <: teaches = Prof->C
        Person <: enrolled = Stud->C
        Person <: projects = Stud->P
        Course <: projects = C->P
        Course <: grades = Prof->G1                           // Professor (non-student) has a grade (requirement violated)
        Grade <: next = G1->G2
    }
} for 2 Person, 1 Course, 1 Project, 2 Grade expect 0
